title: Font on logo, very simple
content:
I know that the font on that logo is a very common one, but I can’t figure it out. realize which one! Please check it out on [http://www.costaoriental.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080510073345/http:/www.costaoriental.com/ "http://www.costaoriental.com")  
Thanks in advance.

 [‹ Cut-up slab serif used in japanese ad campaign (ca. 2006)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080510073345/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41582 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help with velvet underground / andy warhol font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080510073345/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43316 "Go to next forum topic")
author: synergia
